QuestData.Title: Forbidden Quilboar Necromancy
QuestData.Description:
Quilboar are primitive and savage. They rarely practice any magic other than geomancy.
But these particular quilboar seem to be dabbling in necromancy. They must be stopped.
Slay the quilboar in the den. We cannot allow them to raise an army of the undead!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa Quilboar within the Quilboar Briarpatch.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Austin Huxworth to the north of the Quilboar Briarpatch.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work. I hope those quilboar learn that necromancy is not a path to power.
